records.job_title: Banking and Finance Solicitor (5+ years PQE)
records.job_description: We are looking for an intermediate - senior Banking and Finance Solicitor to join our fast paced team. Ideally you will have top-tier firm or advanced in-house experience and familiar with both domestic and international banking laws and regulations.

We are looking for a talented Account Coordinator with at least 2 years experience to join our team and ensure superior customer service to our growing and diverse client base. In this role you will work closely with clients and colleagues to ensure the delivery of products and services that meet our clients needs and manage the daily interaction to enhance our client relationships. Because the role is client facing we are looking for someone with exceptional written and verbal communication skills with a proven ability to build strong relationships and manage their own time efficiently and effectively.

In this role you will work closely with clients and colleagues to ensure the delivery of products and services that meet our clients needs and manage the daily interaction to enhance our client relationships. Because the role is client facing we are looking for someone with exceptional written and verbal communication skills with a proven ability to build strong relationships and manage their own time efficiently and effectively.

We are looking for a qualified Accountant to join our firms Business Advisory division. This is a client facing role where you will be working with managers and directors of companies from a range of different industries and sectors. This role is just as much about building strong, long lasting relationships as it is about the provision of accounting services and advice so the ideal candidate will be a people person with strong communication and interpersonal skills and exceptional business and accounting acumen.

records.job_title: Banking and Finance Solicitor (5+ years PQE)
records.job_description: We are looking for an intermediate - senior Banking and Finance Solicitor to join our fast paced team. Ideally you will have top-tier firm or advanced in-house experience and familiar with both domestic and international banking laws and regulations.

We are looking for an Accounting Manager with 2 - 4 years' experience who will be responsible for overseeing all financial activities of our company. This is a hands-on role that requires someone who is an excellent written and verbal communicator, analytical and capable of u2018hitting the ground running.  Central to this role is ensuring the integrity of the company accounts, this broadly includes managing the preparation and audit of financial statements and monitoring transactional activities so that they are accounted for correctly / accurately with any anomalies identified quickly. Being CA or CPA qualified will be an advantage.  If this sounds like you then we look forward to receiving your application.

We are a well-regarded Accounting firm looking for an Accounts Assistant to join our energetic and friendly team. You don't have to have all the experience in the world, but you do have to be motivated to learn and have great interpersonal skills.  Our ideal candidate will be a junior / entry level accountant who has had some experience preparing financial statements and knows their way around the latest accounting software (XERO, QuickBooks, MYOB etc) and Microsoft Office applications.  You will work closely with senior Accountants and Partners on simple and complex matters for our clients and be responsible for financial data entry and maintenance of financial records.  If you are looking for an opportunity that gives you broad exposure to the operation of an Accounting firm a taste of different types of work then we want to hear from you.

We are looking for a Lawyer with 2 u2013 4 years PQE (In-House) to join our company. You will be conversant with local laws and regulations within our operating environment and ensure legal and regulatory compliance while leading corporate strategic initiatives to help our business grow. The ideal candidate will have a strong commercial / business acumen and experience developing legal risk strategies and advising on complex financial and legal transactions.
